title: Nupur Sharma suspended from BJP for her comments about Prophet Muhammad
content:
The Bharatiya Janata Party on Sunday suspended its national spokesperson Nupur Sharma after a controversy erupted over her comments about Prophet Muhammad.Om Pathak, member secretary of Central Disciplinary Committee, said that Sharma had expressed views that were contrary to BJPâ€™s stance on several matters. Sharma had violated the BJPâ€™s constitution, he added.â€œI have been directed to convey to you that pending further inquiry, you [Sharma] are suspended from the party and from your responsibilities/assignments if any, with immediate effect,â€ Pathak said.
